participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Michael is a passionate and enthusiastic individual with a competitive spirit. He enjoys sharing stories about his achievements and has a quirky sense of humor.
participant_1.background: i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics. i love cats and have two cats. i have a hat collection of over 1000 hats. i have a weakness for vanilla ice cream. my favorite season is winter.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Sarah is a curious and nurturing person, always eager to learn and explore new things. She has a warm demeanor and finds joy in sharing experiences with those around her.
participant_2.background: my favorite kind of movie is a documentary. i'm pregnant with my first child. i live with my husband in pennsylvania. i read a book every week.
